channel.title: I need help making a command which makes logs
channel.description:
Im trying to make a few commands make logs like ::givemod and that so when i make someone a mod it goes to moderatorslog.txt.
Can someone help me please... :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2007, 06:19:55 AM[/size][hr]Cmon someone out theres gotta know

item.title: I need help making a command which makes logs
item.dc:creator: @ShIzNeT ShIzNeT
item.description:
@ShIzNeT wrote:

When I remove like ‘Try {’ I get alot of errors.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making a command which makes logs

item.title: I need help making a command which makes logs
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

[quote=“ShIzNeT, post:5, topic:134789”]This is my command, I get 1 error.

[code]if(command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
}

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new

FileWriter(“logs/moderators.txt”, true));
bw.write(“playerName+”);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error saving names!”);
}
}
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new

FileWriter(“data/moderators.txt”, true));
bw.write(“playerName+: is a Moderator.”);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error saving names!”);
}
}
}[/code]

PIC:
[/quote]

You need to add a catch in there, or remove try.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help making a command which makes logs
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

[quote=“ShIzNeT, post:3, topic:134789”]Like that?

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/moderatorlogs.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName + ": );
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();[/quote]

Exactly like that, now modify it for your command (Base it off ::banuser) and don’t forget the catch. If you have any problems, I’ll be glad to help because you seem like you know what your doing :D.

Read full topic
